memoria.title: Memoria
memoria.description: Memoria is a project that allows you to create a full movie enhanced with AI from your pictures.

artchive.title: Artchive
artchive.description: Artchive is a personal project I created to display some of the drawings & illustrations I love from the artists I love.

cfdoc.title: cf.doc
cfdoc.description: cf.doc is my last school project. It's an AI tool that helps team to understand the technical knowledge.

pimpim.title: Pimpim's adventure
pimpim.description: PimPim’s adventure is a video game where you play as PimPim, a penguin who has to go through all four seasons to finally reach winter and his home.

aurore.title: Aurore
aurore.description: Aurore is a low-code school project. It is a platform that allows you to rent house and apartments designed by architects and interior designers.

uso.title: USO
uso.description: USO is a tool that allows you to synchronize your Osu & spotify accounts to enhance your playlists.
